sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Add new system property if not exsist for menu setting upgrade.</description> <name>Use new menu settings property creation</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var SYS_PROP_USE_NEW_MENU_SETTINGS = 'com.glide.cs.use_new_menu_settings'; if (gs.getProperty(SYS_PROP_USE_NEW_MENU_SETTINGS, null) == null) { gs.setProperty(SYS_PROP_USE_NEW_MENU_SETTINGS, true); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-03-19 21:00:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>793995f8c30320100f24c87af040dd30</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Use new menu settings property creation</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Conversation Branding Settings" source="com.glide.cs.branding">217df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f76</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_793995f8c30320100f24c87af040dd30</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-03-19 21:00:12</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Use new menu settings property creation
